title: sydraQL: language goals & scope
body: Define sydraQL goals: simple TS-first query language with time windows, tag filters, rollups, math, joins on time, and alert expressions. Non-goals: arbitrary cross-series joins, complex UDFs v1.

title: sydraQL: lexical syntax & tokens
body: Durations (1s,5m,1h,1d), timestamps (ISO8601/epoch), identifiers, string/number literals, comments, keywords.

title: sydraQL: EBNF grammar v0
body: Write EBNF for SELECT, FROM series, WHERE (time & tag filters), GROUP BY time(), FILL, ORDER/LIMIT/OFFSET, functions.

title: sydraQL: doc with examples
body: Examples for range scans, downsampling, tag filters, math, joins-on-time, alert predicates.

title: sydraQL: lexer in Zig
body: Implement zero-copy lexer with slice-based tokens; error spans and messages.

title: sydraQL: parser + AST
body: Recursive-descent parser building typed AST structs; recover from minor errors for better UX.

title: sydraQL: duration/timezone parsing
body: Support s/m/h/d/w durations; ISO8601 with timezone; default tz; NOW() builtin.

title: Planner: logical plan
body: Translate AST to logical ops: Scan, Filter, Project, Agg(window), Sort, Limit, JoinTime.

title: Planner: rule-based rewrites
body: Predicate pushdown (time/tag), rollup selection, projection pruning, filter simplification.

title: Execution: operators
body: Implement vectorized operators for Scan/Filter/Project/Aggregate/Sort/Limit; streaming iterators.

title: Execution: group-by time windows
body: time_bucket(step, ts[, origin]) and tumbling windows; partial agg combine for parallelism.

title: Execution: downsample selection
body: Planner chooses rollup series (1m/5m/1h) when query step >= rollup; fall back to raw.

title: Execution: join on time
body: ALIGN JOIN: align two series by time bucket (nearest/forward-fill); constraints: same step/zone.

title: Nulls & fill policy
body: FILL (prev|linear|null|number) semantics; per-series and per-select-item control.

title: Limits & quotas
body: MAX_POINTS, MAX_SERIES per query; timeout; memory budgeting; error codes.

title: Function registry & type system
body: Register scalar funcs (abs, ln, pow), aggs (min,max,avg,sum,count,last,rate,irate,delta), and time funcs.

title: Window/derivative functions
body: moving_avg, exponential_moving_avg, rate/irate, delta/integral with step-aware logic.

title: Tag filter syntax
body: AND/OR/NOT, =, !=, =~, !~ operators on tags; exact vs regex; case sensitivity doc.

title: HTTP endpoint: /api/v1/sydraql
body: POST text/plain sydraQL → JSON result; stream chunks; include query_stats.

title: CLI: sydradb query
body: `sydradb query -f query.sq` or stdin; table/CSV/JSON output; --pretty and --raw flags.

title: Docs: compatibility notes
body: Compare sydraQL to InfluxQL/PromQL; mapping guide; what’s intentionally different.

title: Conformance tests
body: Golden tests: query → result; fuzzing parser; randomized window/agg tests.

title: Benchmarks
body: Microbenchmarks for parser, planner, and operator throughput; end-to-end query p50/p95.
